text: Billy Moore (17 February 1910 – 31 March 1976)Billy Moore rugby union player profile Scrum.com was a Welsh international dual-code rugby player who played rugby union for Bridgend RFC and rugby league for Rochdale Hornets. He was capped only once for Wales under the union code, for a match in the 1933 Home Nations Championship. ==International matches played== WalesSmith (1980), pg 469. * 1933 ==Bibliography== * * * ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:Wales international rugby union players Category:Rugby union locks Category:Welsh rugby league players Category:Bridgend RFC players Category:Rochdale Hornets players Category:Glamorgan County RFC players
title: Billy Moore (rugby)
